To install the project the first time.

1. Install Brew

2. Install Ruby

3. gem install bundle jekyll

4. bundle install jekyll

5. to see drafts:

$ bundle exec jekyll server --watch --drafts

to see prod posts:

$ bundle exec jekyll serve



6. To prepare site for prod env:
This will:
- Use production URLs instead of localhost
- Enable any production-only features
- Generate proper sharing URLs and meta tags

$JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve
